pluggable.name: Minification
pluggable.author: eighty4
pluggable.description: Minifies html, css and js as well as combines all css and js files. Uses http://code.google.com/p/minify/

help.value: Will only work on css and javascript files added using Stack::add( 'template_stylesheet') and Stack::add('template_header_javascript'). If you're using javascript that's depending on other javascript make sure it's loaded in the right order using Stack Dependencies
